TABLE.NAME: leganto
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_leganto in a course.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: The unique id for this Leganto instance.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: The course this Leganto instance belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the Leganto instance. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the Leganto instance. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this Leganto instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: display
FIELD.COMMENT: The display type of the Leganto contents - on a separate page or inline.

FIELD.NAME: citations
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma separated list of selected Leganto resource list citations.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this Leganto instance.

INDEX.NAME: course
INDEX.COMMENT: The course this Leganto instance belongs to.
